New Records: Nikola Jokic secured his 144th career triple-double
Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic had 23 points, 17 rebounds and 15 assists
Russell Westbrook added 16 to go with 11 assists
The Nuggets broke open the game with a 39-14 run in the third quarter
Trae Young was called for a technical foul during the stretch, and De'Andre Hunter drew a technical for flopping
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Gordon was sidelined by a strained right calf
Post-Match Reflections: The Nuggets won their third straight game
It started a busy 17-game month on the right note for Denver
The Nuggets had seven players finish in double figures
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets finished a perfect 21 of 21 from the free throw line
They also set a season-high in assists with 44 as they finished 2-0 against the Hawks this season
Young now has five or more assists in 193 straight regular season games
It's the third-longest streak in NBA history, trailing only John Stockton (336) and Isiah Thomas (209)
